property.value: Действие доступно если у поручения нет документа-основания или он не в финальном статусе

property.name: conditionErrorMessage

property.name: transitionDocumentChangeScript
property.value:
<import resource="classpath:/alfresco/module/errands-repo/workflow/scripts/errands-execute-errand-script.js">
                                                                var doc = bpm_package.children[0];
if(doc){
  lecmPermission.pushAuthentication();
  lecmPermission.setRunAsUserSystem();
  var type = doc.assocs["lecm-errands:type-assoc"][0];
  var isReview = type.properties["lecm-errands-dic:errand-type-launch-review"];
  if (isReview) {
    ExecuteErrandScript.processReviewErrandChildExecuted(doc);
  }
  var childrenResolutions = errands.getChildResolutions(doc.nodeRef.toString());
  var hasOnExecution = false;
  var docExecutor = doc.properties["lecm-errands:executor-assoc-ref"];
  if (childrenResolutions && childrenResolutions.length) {
      for (var i = 0; i < childrenResolutions.length; i++) {
          var childAuthor = null;
          if (childrenResolutions[i].typeShort == "lecm-resolutions:document") {
              childAuthor = childrenResolutions[i].properties["lecm-resolutions:author-assoc-ref"];
          }
          if (docExecutor && childAuthor && docExecutor == childAuthor) {
              if (!statemachine.isFinal(childrenResolutions[i].nodeRef.toString())) {
                  if (childrenResolutions[i].properties["lecm-statemachine:status"] == "На исполнении") {
                      hasOnExecution = true;
                      break;
                  }
              }
          }
      }
  }
  doc.properties["lecm-errands:transit-to-on-execution"] = hasOnExecution;
  doc.save();
  edsDocument.resetChildChangeSignal(doc);
  lecmPermission.popAuthentication();
}

property.name: transitionDocumentChangeScript
property.value:
<import resource="classpath:/alfresco/module/errands-repo/workflow/scripts/errands-execute-errand-script.js">
var doc = bpm_package.children[0];
if (doc) {
  lecmPermission.pushAuthentication();
  lecmPermission.setRunAsUserSystem();
  var type = doc.assocs["lecm-errands:type-assoc"][0];
  var isReview = type.properties["lecm-errands-dic:errand-type-launch-review"];
  if (isReview) {
    ExecuteErrandScript.processReviewErrandChildExecuted(doc);
  }
  ExecuteErrandScript.processChildExecutedSignal(doc);
  var childrenErrands = errands.getChildErrands(doc.nodeRef.toString());
  if (childrenErrands && childrenErrands.length) {
      var countErrandsFinal = 0;
      for (var i =0; i < childrenErrands.length; i++) {
          if (statemachine.isFinal(childrenErrands[i].nodeRef.toString())) {
            countErrandsFinal++;
          }
      }
      if (countErrandsFinal == childrenErrands.length && !doc.properties["lecm-errands:report-required"]) {
          doc.properties["lecm-errands:transit-to-executed"] = true;
          doc.save();
      }
  }
  edsDocument.resetChildChangeSignal(doc);
  lecmPermission.popAuthentication();
}

property.name: transitionDocumentChangeScript
property.value:
<import resource="classpath:/alfresco/module/errands-repo/workflow/scripts/errands-execute-errand-script.js">
var doc = bpm_package.children[0];
if (doc) {
    lecmPermission.pushAuthentication();
    lecmPermission.setRunAsUserSystem();
    var type = doc.assocs["lecm-errands:type-assoc"][0];
    var isReview = type.properties["lecm-errands-dic:errand-type-launch-review"];
    if (isReview) {
      ExecuteErrandScript.processReviewErrandChildExecuted(doc);
    }
    ExecuteErrandScript.processChildExecutedSignal(doc);
    edsDocument.resetChildChangeSignal(doc);
    lecmPermission.popAuthentication();
}

                                                                var doc = bpm_package.children[0];
if (doc) {
    lecmPermission.pushAuthentication();
    lecmPermission.setRunAsUserSystem();
  	ExecuteErrandScript.processReviewErrandChildExecuted(doc);
  	edsDocument.resetChildChangeSignal(doc);
